Eve Milan New York Gentle Face Cleaning Gel No. 103 (2020 formulation)

Brand: Eve Milan New York

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, EcoCert Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Vegetable Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera Extract (Coconut Milk), Cucumis Sativa (Cucumber) Peel Extract, Oat Flour, Chamaemel
book: 1219-Eve Milan New York Gentle Face Cleaning Gel No

chunk:
Oat Flour, Chamaemelum nobile (Chamomile) Leaf Extract, Zinc PCA, Panthenol (ProVitamin B5), Glucosamine, Allantoin, Xanthamonas campestris (Xanthan) Gum, Sodium Benzoate, Cucumber Seed

Directions: 1. Apply to damp skin, avoiding eyes and lips, using circular motion.
2. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.
3. For best results use in the morning and a
book: 1219-Eve Milan New York Gentle Face Cleaning Gel No

chunk:
in the morning and at night followed by our Hydrating or Refreshing Toner.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
